mapper.update: UPDATE pr_back_tracking_batch SET has_advance = #{hasAdvance}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_time = sysdate() WHERE back_tracking_batch_code = #{code}
UPDATE pr_back_tracking_batch SET has_money = #{hasMoney}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_time = sysdate() WHERE back_tracking_batch_code = #{code}
